title: The Mill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and bar. Large menu, includes a kale and other salads, a barbecue tofu appetizer, a veggie burger, and a vegan cheese pizza with seitan topping. Vegans need to specify just to be sure. On some dishes could substitute for vegan cheese (extra charge). Also offers a meatless Monday menu.
